title: Plan afoot to put out approved list of cos & models for solar cells: Pralhad Joshi
description: The government is considering an approved list of models and manufacturers for solar cells, according to Renewable Energy Minister Pralhad Joshi. This decision is expected soon. Currently, the list exists for solar modules. India's cell manufacturing capacity is set to rise significantly by the end of the financial year, with most current imports coming from China.
